body: So i made a map, rese fixed some little things, then he gave me a download to the one thats fixed. Ive been trying to download it, but i dont know how. Help pls?
body_tagged: So i made a map, rese fixed some little things, then he gave me a download to the one thats fixed. Ive been trying to download it, but i dont know how. Help pls?
title: Erhm, how do i download the map?

replies.body: is it a .zip or a folder? if it's a .zip, you have to unzip it and then put the resulting folder in your saves folder. on windows to access your save folder, go to run> %appdata%> .minecraft > saves> put the folder in. if it's a folder, just do all of this w/o unzipping it
replies.body_tagged: is it a .zip or a folder? if it's a .zip, you have to unzip it and then put the resulting folder in your saves folder. on windows to access your save folder, go to run> %appdata%> .minecraft > saves> put the folder in. if it's a folder, just do all of this w/o unzipping it
